title: FND Compile Errors / FND Derleme Hataları
description: Identifies compilation errors in Oracle Applications Foundation (FND) objects and custom packages that may prevent functionality

queries.sql: SELECT NAME, TYPE, LINE, POSITION, TEXT FROM ALL_ERRORS WHERE OWNER IN ('APPS', 'APPLSYS') AND ATTRIBUTE = 'ERROR' ORDER BY NAME, LINE

doc_hint: Zero compilation errors is the target. If found, identify the package or procedure and investigate. May require recompilation or code review.
analysis_prompt: Report total compilation errors found. List error types and affected objects. Recommend recompilation or code review if errors exist.
